name: Jon G. Rokne
content: COMPUTER GRAPHICS SOCIAL NETWORKS Jon Rokne Linkedin COMPUTER GRAPHICS - SOCIAL NETWORKS Jon Rokne, Professor, Department of Computer Science, University of Calgary. How to contact Jon Rokne Research interests and some publications of Jon Rokne including a book U of C webmail link. ESNAM --Encyclopedia of Social Network Analysis and Mining (ESNAM) University of Calgary Press Books ESNAM -- Poster. Search link. Some useful links Other material LINK ANALYSIS search with: link: http://pages.cpsc.ucalgary.ca/~rokne/ Montage Portrait by Tayfun Akgul. Photo by Knut Rokne. How to contact Jon Rokne There are a number of ways of contacting Jon Rokne: Office: Room 714 of the ICT Building of the University of Calgary. Phone 403-220-6016. Address: Department of Computer Science, University of Calgary, 2500 University Dr. N.W., Calgary, Alberta, Canada T2N-1N4. e-mail address is: rokneZZZZucalgary.ca or rokneZZZZcomputer.org (replace ZZZZ by an "at" sign).
